entry.title: Customize the Favicon
entry.summary: The favicons of Chirpy are placed in the directory assets/img/favicons/. You may need to replace them with your own. The following sections will guide you how to create and replace the default favicons. entry.title: Writing a New Post
entry.summary: Naming and Path Create a new file named YYYY-MM-DD-TITLE.EXTENSION and put it in the _posts/ of the root directory. Please note that the EXTENSION must be one of md and markdown.
